channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024031043
item.description:
Report X-2024031043

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-28T15:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-14
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On March 14th a package was discovered during the AM sort that was crushed and leaking. The package contained 2 bottles of fragrance that were classified as ID8000 Consumer Commodity, 9. The outer package was crushed at some point during transit and the entire contents of the bottles leaked out. The package and contents were sent out for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024030610
item.description:
Report X-2024030610

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-27T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-24
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Alaska Airlines
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Agent was using the x-ray machine when they saw an aerosol inside the shipment and did physical search to confirm. 2 aerosol cans and 1 electric vape was found
